SAVE YOUR TIME, ENERGY AND MONEY IF YOU INTEND TO PLAY KILLER. 
Playing killer has become unbearable. Between toxic survivor mains who haven't touched killer for fear of getting rolled and mechanics+meta perks that allow survivors to completely ignore any threat the killer may pose, playing killer is no longer fun. 
Thanks to recent updates:
-survivors heal almost instantly
-servers prioritize survivor actions over killer actions (i.e. you will hit survivors and they won't take damage because their screen showed something else)
-most maps are so large survivors will often abuse their ability to run from one side to the other during chase causing you to waste minutes on 1 down. Do the math. A gen can be completed in 80 secs. There are 5 gens in total. There are 4 survivors and you can only chase 1 survivor at a time. If a single survivor holds W and makes you waste at least 80 secs, this means the remaining 3 survivors will complete 3 gens. The odds are inherently not in your favor, clearly.
-survivors will force you to play said large maps via map offerings, hide all game or run across the map to abuse the same powerful tile in every chase if found, only to brag about how great they think they are. 
-this community consists of so many entitled babies that when a killer is buffed in any way or a meta survivors perk is nerfed, it's considered a literal crime. 

PLAYING SURVIVOR on the other hand, has become so easy you can literally dumpster any killer by simply running forward and pre-dropping every pallet. If you need an ego trip, this is the game for you. Learn how to loop, learn how to look behind you while running, understand the difference between slow, medium and fast vaults, learn which killers are weaker toward running across the map and which are weaker toward pre-dropping pallets, and you're set.

tldr: Survivor is a smooth, easy, fun and welcoming experience to any new or old player. Killer is comparable to ball torture. You like Freddy Kreuger, Michael Myers, Leatherface, Pinhead, Jigsaw/ Pig? This game strips away all of the things that makes them threatening and paints clown makeup on their faces.
loop your schizophrenia like you loop the killer

Good game but .... You can plan only online - only with other people - most of the time You are waiting in the lobby to play few minutes matches

I will change to positive when there will be possibility to play OFFLINE/BOTS matches with rules to choose

Игра понравилась.
За время в игре 100 часов не наскучила, а скорее наоборот заинтересовала больше!
Игру можно порекомендовать не всем, так как людям со слабой психикой может повредить или привести к нежелательным последствиям (как ни как тут можно играть за маньяка). Для некоторых игра может показаться страшной, но думаю таких тут нет.
В любом случае рекомендую игру.

Lots of fun, really appreciate the variety of perks. The perk system in itself can significantly change the way each person plays, and it's also pretty cool that there are usually 2-3 different perks for any specific thing that you want to do.

씨잇팔 살인마 최하티어인데 빨랭 생존자랑만 매칭시키는게 말이되냐. 그지같은겜 오래 붙들고 버텨보려고 했는데 빨랭 4명상대로는 아무것도 못함. 빨랭 4명이 국밥 조합 칼찌, 시계, 데하 이거 다 들고와서 살인마 패는데 어케함. ㅈㅈ
玩了也有1000多个小时，不多。但也挺喜欢这游戏。但是就说一个事情！官方不管外挂！被外挂锁了ID的主播付导，老玩家应该都认识。找官方都不给解决。让人寒心！可以去B站看看2021-12-24付导的视频。普通玩家只能在这里声援。你官方一边继续出着DLC/皮肤卖钱，但又不顾玩家游戏体验，非常非常让人失望！！
Loop killer for 2 gens, get camped for 3 gens. Fun game.

Das Spiel ist super, ob Einzeln oder als Team (mit Verständigung über Discord) gegen den Killer oder selbst einmal als Killer spielen, es mach einfach Spaß. Schade ist, dass es nicht möglich ist sich mit den anderen Überlebenden über das Spiel direkt zu verständigen. Auch diverse Bugs sind teilweise nervig, beeinflussen das gesamte Spielerlebnis allerdings nur selten bis gar nicht.

greedy and crappy dev, they never fix their game but always make it worse. definition of toxicity by both the players (both survivors and killers) and the developers that somehow manage to make the game even more rage inducing. save your money and sanity.
edit : 60 more hours into this game after my last review and i still stand by it.
